titleStmt.title: The historie of the life and death of Mary Stuart Queene of Scotland
Annales rerum Anglicarum et Hibernicarum regnante Elizabetha. English. Abridgments
titleStmt.author: Camden, William, 1551-1623.
Udall, William.
Elstracke, Renold, fl. 1590-1630, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Richard Whitaker, and are to be sold at the signe of the Kings head in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Largely a translation of the relevant passages of: Camden, William. Annales rerum Anglicarum et Hibernicarum regnante Elizabetha.
Translator's dedication signed: Wil. Stranguage, i.e. William Udall.
The frontispiece portrait is signed: R: Elstrack sculpsit Are to be sold by Compton Holland ouer against thexchange.
Running title reads: The historie of Marie Queene of Scotland.
One of three imprint variants of this edition. In this state the dedication, with pseudonymous signature, is a cancel.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Kings head in Pauls Church-yard
